NAME: realme 12x 5G (Twilight Purple, 128 GB)  (6 GB RAM)
Description: The Realme 12x 5G is a sleek powerhouse redefining mobile technology. Swift charging meets endurance with 45 W SUPERVOOC Charge and a 5000 mAh battery, ensuring you're always connected. The Dimensity 6100+ 6nm chipset delivers lightning-fast 5G speeds for seamless connectivity wherever you are. Immerse yourself in the 12.07 cm (6.72) 120 Hz FHD+ Display, offering crystal-clear visuals with its ultra-smooth refresh rate. Style meets substance with its ultra-slim 7.69 mm profile and lightweight 188g body. Capture life's moments in stunning detail with the 50 MP AI camera, while the vapour chamber cooling system keeps performance optimal. Elevate your audio experience with dual stereo speakers, delivering Hi-Res Audio certification for immersive sound. The Realme 12x 5G: where innovation meets elegance in the palm of your hand.

NAME: Apple iPhone 15 (Blue, 128 GB)

Capture life with precision using the 48 MP Main Camera, perfect for any shot. Powered by the A16 Bionic Processor, it excels in computational photography and more, all while conserving battery life. Plus, it's USB-C compatible, simplifying your charging needs. Elevate your tech game with the iPhone 15 – innovation at your fingertips. Goodbye cable clutter, hello convenience.

NAME: Tecno Phantom V fold 5G Full Size Fold LTPO AMOLED Display (Black, 256 GB)  (12 GB RAM)
Description: Putting forth the Tecno Phantom V Fold, an advanced folding phone that provides an early look at mobile technologies of the future. Its flexible AMOLED display and large ultra-flat folding main screen, measuring 19.93 cm (7.85), provide a smooth, crease-free visual experience. With a 90.1% screen-to-body ratio and crisp 100 resolution, the stunning 16.30 cm (6.42) curved sub-screen will allow you to fully immerse yourself. This phone's revolutionary folding design blends elegance with sustainability, and there are two attractive models available. The 5-lens camera system, which has two front and back cameras with up to 50 MP sensors and remarkable low-light sensitivity, allows you to take beautiful pictures. Led by the premier 4 nm MediaTek Dimensity 9000 + 5G CPU, this device offers up to 12 GB of RAM and 512 GB of UFS 3.1 storage for unparalleled performance. With the biggest battery in its class and a 45 W in-box charger for quick charging, you can stay powered all day and be prepared for any situation that arises.
